content:
The Department of Mathematics and Statistics at Masaryk University, in Brno, Czechia, invites applications for a research position in category theory and related areas, supported by the project "Enriched categories and their applications".

The deadline for applications is 22 Oct 2023.

Further details are available here.

https://www.muni.cz/en/about-us/careers/vacancies/76670

If you have any queries, feel free to send an email to bourkej@math.muni.cz.
